Final Cooking Fantasy

Mains
Sides
Sauces
Treats

Oat Bites

Notes
What's in it
  • 1 1/4 cup oats
  • 1/2 cup peanut butter
  • 1/4 cup honey
  • 1/3 cup mini m&ms
  • 1/3 cup chipits
What to do
  • Mix together , roll into balls.
  • Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes - 1 hour
